sentences.sentence: His friends were very happy to see him and one noticed that his nystagmus was much less.
sentences.translation: 他的朋友见到他都很高兴，他们其中之一注意到劳伦斯的眼震比以前少多了。

sentences.sentence: AIM: To investigate the effect of botulin a (BTA) on patients with congenital nystagmus (CN).
sentences.translation: 目的：观察肉毒杆菌毒素a (BTA)治疗先天性眼球震颤(CN)的效果。

sentences.sentence: DVD, abnormal oblique muscle function and nystagmus were all observed in patients with strabismus.
sentences.translation: 所有伴斜肌异常、分离性垂直斜视或眼球震颤者均见于斜视表型。
